title: Ok I will just go on and say it, give me the downvotes...
body:
What the fuck is this new Galio design???  I absolutely hate it, I just came from college couple of mins ago to see this shit and it completely ruined my day. It has literally 0 heart to it, its ugly, the colors are awfull, the design sucks balls, its not a gargoyle any more, the voice sounds like fucking mundo (I love mundo dont get me wrong) and so do new quotes, where as he used to be a vice ancient sculpture,  HE DOESNT FUCKING FLY ANY MORE !!!!  The skills are the ones of a brute, instead of an ancient mage sentinel. 

It might be too soon to say this, but as a Galio semi-main and huge fan - THIS REWORK IS THE FIRST ONE THAT I WILL SAY IS ABSOLUTELY AND UTTERLY TERRIBLE IN BOTH GAMEPLAY AND DESIGN !!!!!

RIP in piece  Sentinel's Sorrow, thank you for countless hours of fun (and freelo in season 2 when you carried me out of gold elo), I will alway love you and remember you as you were <3  {{item:3070}} {{champion:3}} {{item:3070}} 

P.S. - fuck you RIOT seriously...

replies.body:
The teaser just looks so... gaudy. It's about opposite as you can get from Galio's traditional look/feel. 

I honestly feel like the teaser and art would have worked better for a Jayce rework than a Galio rework.

^This.  I know they like turn turn champs on their head, but that 'sentinel's sorrow' vibe from his voice was a huge part of the ambiance when playing the champion.
I need the entire VO to make a conclusive decision.

And how can you be so sure his gameplay is "UTTERLY TERRIBLE"?

Are you a playtester?

Excuse me if you go directly from a champion with typical caster skillshots Q and E , a shield with healing on W and a potential 5 man taunt ultimate to a dude that has a dash (mobility on fucking Galio), some kind of Vi ulti on a regular skill and the wtf Thor ulti, it kind of ruins the gameplay as well as it did ruin the character and the design. There is just nothing in this new "Galio" that even remotely reminds me of a champion I fell in love with long fucking time ago and that I still play to this day even though he is the lowest playrate in the game most of the time...

That was my first thought as well.

And my second thought was, "This doesn't look like a character I can take mid when my team needs a tank." That is why I picked up Galio in the first place. =.=

Love Galio. Not too keen on the default skin or the voice, gatekeeper looks awesome doe. I just need to see the spells and read what he does now. Im on the fence, but I will give riot the benefit of the doubt here. {{champion:3}} forever and always {{champion:3}}

Chillax.  I too am disheartened by the teaser.
I fear the weight of the champ's character is gone.
Let's both wait until the actual kit and VO release tomorrow to see what actually happened.
It's ok just let the salt out. Everything is going to be ok.
